meanings.definition: To officially attach or connect oneself to a group or organization.
meanings.sent1: She decided to affiliate with the local charity to help the community.
meanings.sent2: Many businesses choose to affiliate with well-known brands for better exposure.
meanings.sent3: John wanted to affiliate with the superhero team, but they were full.
meanings.sent4: The vines seemed to affiliate with each other, creating a beautiful natural canopy.
meanings.sent5: The student eagerly affiliated with the science club to learn more about experiments.

meanings.definition: A person or organization officially connected to a larger group or organization.
meanings.sent1: The bookstore is an affiliate of the national chain, offering a wide selection of books.
meanings.sent2: The local affiliate of the TV network covers news specific to the region.
meanings.sent3: The tiny bakery became an affiliate of the famous pastry chef's empire.
meanings.sent4: Being an affiliate of the prestigious university opened many doors for the research center.
meanings.sent5: The affiliate of the environmental organization organized a beach cleanup event.
